column1: (2)  sugar,  dhal,  potatoes,  onions,  dried  fish,  milk  powder  or
chilies  under  the  provisions  of  the  Special  Commodity  Levy
Act, No. 48 of 2007, where such article is subsequently sold
by the importer of such article; and
(8) petrol, diesel or kerosene sold in a filling station”.
